test_cases.test_name: Verification of Custom Calculations in CDS
test_cases.objective: To verify that the CDS correctly executes custom calculations for non-standard impurity calculations, proprietary relative response factor adjustments, and complex bracketing schemes.

test_steps.action: Load a sample chromatogram into the CDS.
test_steps.expected_result: Chromatogram is successfully loaded and displayed.

test_steps.action: Apply custom calculation formulas for impurity calculations.
test_steps.expected_result: Custom calculations are executed correctly and results are displayed.

test_steps.action: Verify the results against expected values.
test_steps.expected_result: Results match the expected values within acceptable tolerance.

acceptance_criteria: Custom calculations execute within 60 seconds.
Results match expected values within tolerance.
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure data integrity during calculation execution.
Prevent unauthorized data modification.

test_cases.objective: To verify that the CDS correctly interfaces with the LIMS using standard XML format for data export.

test_steps.action: Export analytical data from CDS to LIMS using XML format.
test_steps.expected_result: Data is successfully exported and received by LIMS.

test_steps.action: Verify the data integrity in LIMS.
test_steps.expected_result: Data in LIMS matches the exported data from CDS.

test_steps.action: Check for any errors in the export process.
test_steps.expected_result: No errors are reported during the export process.

acceptance_criteria: Data export completes without errors.
Data in LIMS matches CDS data.
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure data integrity during export.
Prevent unauthorized data modification.

test_cases.test_name: Custom Calculation Verification for Non-Standard Impurities
test_cases.objective: Verify that the CDS correctly executes custom calculations for non-standard impurity determinations as configured in the vendor's formula editor.
prerequisites: Test method with custom impurity calculations loaded
Sample data with known impurity profiles available

test_steps.action: Load the test method containing custom impurity calculations into the CDS.
test_steps.expected_result: Method loads successfully with all custom calculations visible in the formula editor.

test_steps.action: Process a sample chromatogram with known impurity profiles using the custom method.
test_steps.expected_result: System processes the data and applies the custom calculations without errors.

test_steps.action: Compare calculated impurity values against manually calculated expected values.
test_steps.expected_result: Custom calculation results match expected values within acceptable tolerance.

acceptance_criteria: All custom calculations execute without errors
Calculated values match expected results within ±5%
Processing completes within 60 seconds as specified in URS-CDS-014
data_integrity_requirements: Calculation formulas must be locked after verification
All processing steps must be recorded in audit trail

test_cases.objective: Verify the CDS can simultaneously acquire and process data from multiple instruments as specified in the URS.
prerequisites: Test methods loaded on all instruments

test_steps.action: Configure the CDS to monitor and acquire data from all 8 instruments simultaneously.
test_steps.expected_result: System successfully establishes connections to all instruments.

test_steps.action: Initiate sample runs on all instruments within a 5-minute window.
test_steps.expected_result: CDS begins acquiring data from all instruments without errors.

test_steps.action: Monitor system performance during concurrent data acquisition.
test_steps.expected_result: System maintains stable operation with all data streams active.

test_steps.action: Verify all acquired data is complete and properly stored.
test_steps.expected_result: All run data is complete and accessible in the database.

acceptance_criteria: System successfully acquires data from all 8 instruments simultaneously
No data loss or corruption occurs during acquisition
System resources remain within acceptable limits during operation
regulatory_basis: GMP requirements for analytical instrument control
data_integrity_requirements: All acquired data must have complete audit trails
No data gaps permitted in any instrument stream

test_cases.objective: Verify that custom calculation routines execute within the specified time frame of 60 seconds.

test_steps.action: Execute custom calculation routine on sample data
test_steps.expected_result: Calculation completes within 60 seconds

acceptance_criteria: Custom calculation routine executes within 60 seconds
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure no data corruption during calculation

test_cases.objective: Validate the generation of custom reports using the vendor's report designer.

test_steps.action: Generate custom report using configured template
test_steps.expected_result: Report is generated with correct data and format

acceptance_criteria: Custom report is generated accurately
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure report data integrity

test_cases.test_name: Custom Formula Editor Verification for Non-Standard Impurity Calculations
test_cases.objective: Verify the CDS can accurately perform non-standard impurity calculations using the vendor's formula editor as specified in URS-CDS-004.
prerequisites: Test method with custom impurity calculations loaded
Sample data set with known impurity values

test_steps.action: Load the test method containing custom impurity calculations into the CDS.
test_steps.expected_result: Method loads successfully with all custom formulas intact.

test_steps.action: Process the sample data set using the custom method.
test_steps.expected_result: System processes data and applies custom impurity calculations correctly.

test_steps.action: Compare calculated impurity values against known values.
test_steps.expected_result: Calculated values match expected values within acceptable tolerance.

acceptance_criteria: All custom formulas execute without errors
Calculated impurity values are within ±5% of expected values
Processing completes within 60 seconds as per URS-CDS-014
regulatory_basis: Data integrity requirements for analytical calculations
data_integrity_requirements: Calculation formulas cannot be modified during processing
All calculation steps must be recorded in audit trail

test_cases.objective: Verify the CDS can simultaneously acquire and process data from 8 instruments as specified in URS-CDS-012.
prerequisites: Test methods loaded on all instruments

test_steps.action: Initiate simultaneous runs on all 8 instruments using standard test methods.
test_steps.expected_result: System accepts and begins processing all 8 runs without errors.

test_steps.action: Monitor data acquisition across all instruments.
test_steps.expected_result: All instruments show continuous data acquisition without interruption.

test_steps.action: Verify all acquired data is properly stored and indexed.
test_steps.expected_result: Complete data sets from all runs are stored with correct metadata.

acceptance_criteria: System maintains stable operation during all 8 simultaneous runs
No data loss or corruption occurs during acquisition
System resources remain within operational limits
regulatory_basis: 21 CFR Part 11 requirements for data acquisition
data_integrity_requirements: All acquired data must be complete and traceable
No cross-contamination of data between instruments

test_cases.objective: Verify that custom calculations using the vendor's formula editor execute within the specified 60-second timeframe.
prerequisites: Custom calculation formulas created in the formula editor

test_steps.action: Load a sample chromatographic data set with complex peak patterns
test_steps.expected_result: Data set loads successfully and is ready for processing

test_steps.action: Apply custom calculation formula for non-standard impurity calculations
test_steps.expected_result: Formula executes without errors

test_steps.action: Repeat with proprietary relative response factor adjustments
test_steps.expected_result: All calculations complete within 60 seconds

acceptance_criteria: All custom calculations complete within 60 seconds
No errors occur during calculation execution
Results match expected values from manual verification
data_integrity_requirements: Calculation results must be verifiable and reproducible
Execution times must be recorded in audit trail

test_cases.test_name: Custom Report Generation and LIMS Export Test
test_cases.objective: Validate the generation of custom reports and their successful export to LIMS using standard XML format.
prerequisites: CDS software with report designer configured

test_steps.action: Design a custom report template including all required analytical data fields
test_steps.expected_result: Report template saves successfully in the system

test_steps.action: Generate report for completed analytical run using custom template
test_steps.expected_result: Report generates without errors containing all specified data

test_steps.action: Export report data to LIMS using standard XML format
test_steps.expected_result: Data transfers successfully and appears correctly in LIMS

acceptance_criteria: Custom reports contain all required data fields in correct format
XML export files validate against LIMS schema requirements
Data integrity maintained during transfer process
data_integrity_requirements: Report data must match source chromatographic data
Export process must maintain data integrity
Audit trail must record all report generation and export activities

test_cases.test_name: Custom Calculation Routine Execution Time Verification
test_cases.objective: Verify that custom calculation routines execute within the specified time frame of 60 seconds as per URS-CDS-014.

test_steps.action: Load a chromatographic data set with custom calculations into the CDS.
test_steps.expected_result: Data set loads successfully without errors.

test_steps.action: Execute the custom calculation routine.
test_steps.expected_result: Calculation completes within 60 seconds.

acceptance_criteria: Custom calculation routine executes within 60 seconds
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure no data modification during calculation

test_cases.objective: Verify that custom reports can be generated using the vendor's report designer as per URS-CDS-005.

test_steps.action: Select a custom report template in the CDS.
test_steps.expected_result: Template loads successfully without errors.

test_steps.action: Generate a report using the selected template.
test_steps.expected_result: Report is generated correctly with all specified data.

acceptance_criteria: Custom report is generated correctly with all specified data
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure report data matches source data

test_cases.objective: Verify that custom calculation routines execute within the specified time frame of 60 seconds as per URS-CDS-014.

test_steps.action: Load sample chromatographic data into the CDS software.
test_steps.expected_result: Data is successfully loaded and ready for processing.

test_steps.action: Execute the custom calculation routine on the loaded data.
test_steps.expected_result: Calculation completes within 60 seconds.

acceptance_criteria: Custom calculation routine completes within 60 seconds
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure calculation results are accurate and reproducible
